# AK570 Medium Gun Battery / Autocannon
A [color=gold]ballistic[/color] 90mm heavy autocannon firing general-purpose APHE rounds, effective for sustained fire against medium targets.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]150 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]2.5 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]750 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]240 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]512m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]600u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]125u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]50u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Burst (2 shots)[/color]
